content:
RepairTargetDescription Class

Definition

Describes the entities targeted by a repair action.

This class supports the Service Fabric platform; it is not meant to be called directly from your code.

In this Article

public class RepairTargetDescription
Inheritance
Object
RepairTargetDescription
Derived
NodeRepairTargetDescription

Properties

Kind

Gets the kind of the RepairTargetDescription represented by the current object.
